languages.text: {n}Абеляр с удивленным почтением глядит на вас.{/n} "Надо же. Даже мне были неизвестны такие подробности, а я уделил немало времени изучению летописи вашего благородного рода!"
{n}Abelard stares at you with surprise and respect.{/n} "I'll be! Even I was unaware of such details, and I have spent quite some time studying the chronicles of your noble bloodline!"
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр с удивленным почтением глядит на вас.{/n} "Надо же. Даже мне были неизвестны такие подробности, а я уделил немало времени изучению летописи вашего благородного рода!"

{n}Abelard stares at you with surprise and respect.{/n} "I'll be! Even I was unaware of such details, and I have spent quite some time studying the chronicles of your noble bloodline!"

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは驚きと尊敬に満ちたまなざしであなたを見つめる。{/n}「いたします！そこまで詳しくは知りませんでしたが、これでも陛下の高貴な血筋についてはかなりの時間を勉強に費やしてきたつもりです！」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at you with surprise and respect.{/n} "I'll be! Even I was unaware of such details, and I have spent quite some time studying the chronicles of your noble bloodline!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは驚きと尊敬に満ちたまなざしであなたを見つめる。{/n}「いたします！そこまで詳しくは知りませんでしたが、これでも陛下の高貴な血筋についてはかなりの時間を勉強に費やしてきたつもりです！」

languages.text: {n}Abélard vous lance un regard à la fois incrédule et respectueux.{/n} « Ma parole ! Même moi, je ne connaissais pas tous ces détails, malgré tout le temps passé à étudier les chroniques de votre noble lignée ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at you with surprise and respect.{/n} "I'll be! Even I was unaware of such details, and I have spent quite some time studying the chronicles of your noble bloodline!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard vous lance un regard à la fois incrédule et respectueux.{/n} « Ma parole ! Même moi, je ne connaissais pas tous ces détails, malgré tout le temps passé à étudier les chroniques de votre noble lignée ! »

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德带着惊讶与尊重的神色看着你。{/n}“我的天！就连我都不知道这些细节！我当时还花了不少时间，专门研究您的家族高贵血统的历史呢！”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at you with surprise and respect.{/n} "I'll be! Even I was unaware of such details, and I have spent quite some time studying the chronicles of your noble bloodline!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德带着惊讶与尊重的神色看着你。{/n}“我的天！就连我都不知道这些细节！我当时还花了不少时间，专门研究您的家族高贵血统的历史呢！”

languages.text: {n}Abelard starrt dich überrascht und voller Respekt an.{/n} "Das ist doch ...! Selbst mir waren solche Details unbekannt, und ich habe einige Zeit mit dem Studium der Chroniken Eurer edlen Blutlinie verbracht!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at you with surprise and respect.{/n} "I'll be! Even I was unaware of such details, and I have spent quite some time studying the chronicles of your noble bloodline!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard starrt dich überrascht und voller Respekt an.{/n} "Das ist doch ...! Selbst mir waren solche Details unbekannt, und ich habe einige Zeit mit dem Studium der Chroniken Eurer edlen Blutlinie verbracht!"

languages.text: {n}Abelard te observa con sorpresa y respeto.{/n} «¡Vaya! Hasta a mí me costó darme cuenta de esos detalles, ¡y eso que he pasado mucho tiempo estudiando las crónicas de su noble linaje!».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at you with surprise and respect.{/n} "I'll be! Even I was unaware of such details, and I have spent quite some time studying the chronicles of your noble bloodline!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard te observa con sorpresa y respeto.{/n} «¡Vaya! Hasta a mí me costó darme cuenta de esos detalles, ¡y eso que he pasado mucho tiempo estudiando las crónicas de su noble linaje!».

languages.text: {n}Abelard, yüzünde hayret ve saygıyla gözlerini sana dikiyor.{/n} "Yok artık! Asil soyunuzun vakayinamelerini uzun uzadıya incelememe rağmen ben bile böyle ayrıntılardan bihaberdim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stares at you with surprise and respect.{/n} "I'll be! Even I was unaware of such details, and I have spent quite some time studying the chronicles of your noble bloodline!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, yüzünde hayret ve saygıyla gözlerini sana dikiyor.{/n} "Yok artık! Ben bile böyle ayrıntılardan bihaberdim, hem de asil soyunuzun vakayinamelerini uzun uzadıya incelememe rağmen!"
